inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities.

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists Physical Status I - III
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He was febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation.

inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing SILA procedure performed by a single pediatric surgeon (Dr. Ashwin P. Pimpalwar)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia by Dr. Ashwin P. Pimpalwar

inclusion.criterion: Patients judged by parents, physicians and other caretakers as being capable of using the patient controlled analgesia (PCA) device
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are not scheduled to undergo the procedure of SILA
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with concomitant major cardio-respiratory disorders
exclusion.label: unknown
